attributes.action: Replace existing Cumbria bridges with steel-suspension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steel suspension-bridges remove threat from high-water by keeping foundations on dry-land; infrastructure is poor & with bridges 'unsafe' presents ideal-opportunity to pay 'above-market' price to subsidise Corus-plant facing-closure.

rejection.details: It is not clear what action you are requesting with this petition. The use of inverted commas makes your exact meaning unclear. Also, any references to specific businesses need to be removed ie Corus.
reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
